Class CmarDataDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.dao.CmarDataDao

  • @Repository
public class CmarDataDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for the CMAR data
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public CmarData find(java.lang.Integer id)
              throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve an CmarData in the CSS Database from it's unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required CsiroData
        Returns:
        the CsiroData object corresponding to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • find

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<CmarData> find(java.lang.String regionName,
                                          java.lang.String emissionScenario,
                                          java.lang.String climateModel,
                                          java.lang.Integer year)
                              throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve all the CmarData matching the region, emission scenario, climate model and year that are given as parameters
        Parameters:
        regionName: - the name of the region to match
        emissionScenario: - the emission scenario to match
        climateModel: - the climate model to match
        year: - the year to match
        Returns:
        the list of CsiroData that match all the given parameters
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if no CmarData matches the given parameters

      • find

        @Transactional
public CmarData find(java.lang.String regionName,
                          java.lang.String emissionScenarioName,
                          java.lang.String climateModelName,
                          java.lang.Integer year,
                          java.lang.String variableName)
              throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the CmarData matching the required variable, region, emission scenario, climate model and year that are given as parameters
        Parameters:
        regionName: - the name of the region to match
        emissionScenario: - the emission scenario to match
        climateModel: - the climate model to match
        year: - the year to match
        variableName: - the name of the variable to match
        Returns:
        the (unique) CsiroData that match all the given parameters
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if no CmarData matches the given parameters

      • performQueryAndCheckResultList

        private java.util.List<CmarData> performQueryAndCheckResultList(javax.persistence.Query query)
        Perform a query and check the result list is of the right type
        Parameters:
        query: - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the list of CmarData returned by the query and checked

public CmarData save(CmarData cmarData)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
